A new version is available, do you want: 新版本已发布，是否升级？
Account Are you sure to unlink this acco: 你是否确定要取消链接此账号？
Account It will unlink your account to t: 这将会在这台电脑中取消链接你的账号
Address Cozy not cosy: Woops, the address is not correct. Try with "cozy" with a "z"!
Address Don't have an account? Request o: 没有帐号？在这里申请一个
Address Invalid address: 哎呀，地址不正确。必须输入你cozy的链接才能进行连接，例如 https://tonystark.mycozy.cloud
Address No cozy instance at this address: No cozy instance at this address!
Address No email address: You typed an email address. To connect on your cozy you must type its URL, something like https://tonystark.mycozy.cloud
Address This is the web address you use: This is the web address you use to sign in to your cozy.
Address You don't have filled the addres: You don't have filled the address!
AppUpgrade An error happened during the: An error happened after we tried upgrading your Cozy Desktop version. Please contact support at contact@cozycloud.cc.
CGUUpdated In accordance with the RGPD,: In accordance with the RGPD, Cozy informs you of changes to its Terms of Service. Accepting the new ToS is required to keep using your Cozy.
Dashboard Your cozy is up to date!: 你的 cozy 已是最新状态！
Error Bad GLIBCXX version: Your system has an old version of the glibc. You need to update your distribution, see https://cozy-labs.github.io/cozy-desktop/doc/usage/linux.html#supported-distributions
Error Check that the note still exists e: Check that the note still exists either on your Cozy or its owner's. This could also mean that the note is out of sync.
Error Cozy is full: Your Cozy disk space is full. Please remove files and empty your trash before uploading files again.
Error Are you connected to the Internet?: Are you connected to the Internet? You can nevertheless read the content of your note below in degraded mode.
Error it exceeds the folder name size li: 超过文件夹命名长度限制
Error it exceeds the name size limit: it exceeds the name size limit
Error it exceeds the path size limit: it exceeds the path size limi
Error No more disk space: Bummer! The disk space is full on your computer. Try removing some files on your computer to resume the synchronization with your Cozy.
Error Syncdir is empty: Look like you Cozy folder got emptied. May be it is on a hard-drive which is not plugged at the moment? To avoid losing your data, this will not be synchronized.
Error The “{0}” {1} cannot be synchroniz: The “{0}” {1} cannot be synchronized locally because {2} on the {3} system.
Error This note could not be found: This note could not be found
You should rename it in your Cozy.
Folder Select a location for your Cozy f: 请选择你的 Cozy 文件夹的位置：
Folder You cannot synchronize your whole: You cannot synchronize your whole system or personal folder.
Help [ The more you can say about the is: [ The more you can say about the issue, the better: do you have many files? Are they big? Is your cozy up-to-date? ]
Help An error occured while sending your: 向你发送邮件时发生错误。请联系支持。
Help I like a lot what you do, but I hav: I like a lot what you do, but I have an issue:
Help Multi Computer: If you use several computers with this cozy, sending the log from the other ones as well will help us pinpoint the issue.
Help Our community grows everyday and wi: Our community grows everyday and will be happy to give you an helping hand in one of these media:
Help There are still a few more options: There are still a few more options to contact us:
Help We will get back to you as soon as: We will get back to you as soon as possible.
Help You can send us feedback, report bu: You can send us feedback, report bugs and ask for assistance.
Help Your mail has been sent. We will tr: Your mail has been sent. We will try to respond to it really soon!
InvalidConfiguration Please log out and: Please log out and go through the onboarding again or contact us at contact@cozycloud.cc
Password You don't have filled the passw: You don't have filled the password!
Password Your password for the cozy addr: Your password for the cozy address:
Revoked In case you didn't, contact us a: In case you didn't, contact us at contact@cozycloud.cc
Revoked Synchronization with your Cozy i: Synchronization with your Cozy is unavailable, maybe you revoked this computer?
Settings Startup: Your Cozy will be automatically synchronized with your computer
SyncDirEmpty Detail: To avoid losing your data, this will not be synchronized. If you really want to reset the synchronization, you can just remove your Cozy folder.
SyncDirEmpty Message: Look like you Cozy folder got emptied. May be it is on a hard-drive which is not plugged at the moment?
SyncDirUnlinked The client will restart: To enable it again, you must select a new Cozy folder
SyncDirUnlinked You have removed your sy: You deleted your Cozy folder, as a result synchronization has been stopped.
Tray Your cozy is up to date: Your cozy is up to date
Unlink Detail: Your file will no longer be synchronized with your Cozy.
Unlink Message: Are you sure you want to unlink your Cozy?
Unlinked Else, you can just close Cozy D: Else, you can just close Cozy Drive.
Unlinked If you want to register it agai: If you want to register it again, you can restart Cozy Drive.
Unlinked Your device is no longer regist: Your device is no longer registered on your Cozy.
Updater Error ENOSPC: Your disk is full, update cannot be downloaded.
Updater Error Other: An unspecified error prevented update. Please contact the support.
Updater Please wait: Please wait for the update to be downloaded.
Updater It may take a while: It may take a while, depending on your Internet connection speed.
Welcome Your own private cloud: Welcome to Cozy Drive for Desktop !
